sys_update_xml.payload: customc .panel { margin-left: 0px; background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #97999B 0.7; border-radius: 4px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .05); box-shadow: 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.18); width: 100%; height: 200px; -webkit-transition: transform 2s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: transform 2s ease-in-out; transition: transform 2s ease-in-out; } .eachCatelog{ max-height:239.95px; min-height: 170px; background-origin: border-box; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 189px 148px; background-position: bottom; } .margin_multi_catalog { margin-top:10px; padding: 10px; } .panel:hover { -moz-transform: scale(1.05); -webkit-transform: scale(1.05); -o-transform: scale(1.05); -ms-transform: scale(1.05); -webkit-transform: scale(1.05); transform: scale(1.05); } .cust_pad { padding: 8px !important; } .panel-title { color: #53565a; padding: 15px; text-align: -webkit-center; text-align: center; display: block; } .description{ color: #53565a; font-weight: 800; margin: 0px 5px; font-size: 13px; margin-top: 0px; padding: 10px; } .panel-body { padding: 0; } .multi_catalog_mar { margin-top: 10px; } .inc-image { width: 180px; height: 196px; padding: 0; margin-bottom: 0px !important; border-right: 1px solid #BBBCBC; } .textBlock{ border-left:1px solid #97999B 0.7; } //Hover .overlay { position: absolute; top: 60px; border-radius: 5px; bottom: 0; left: 11px; right: 0; height: 62%; width: 92%; opacity: 0; transition: .5s ease; background-color: #87cefa; } .description:hover .overlay { opacity: 0.7; } .text { color: red; font-size: 20px; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%); -ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transform: translate(-50%, -50%); text-align: center; } sp_instancefalseau_multi_catalogfalseau_multi_catalogfalsefalsesp_widgetadmtanoy2019-01-23 19:30:1793f0d9f7dbc7ef4005d2147a3a9619af59au_multi_catalogglobalglobalsp_widget_93f0d9f7dbc7ef4005d2147a3a9619aftbasak2019-01-29 03:51:25

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>shareCatalogData</name><script><![CDATA[function shareCatalogData() {
	var catalogData;
	this.myFunc=function(s){
	this.catalogData = s;
		
};
	
this.getData=function(){
 return this.catalogData;
 };
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admTanoy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-10 20:18:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>82883665db56a70005d2147a3a9619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>shareCatalogData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_82883665db56a70005d2147a3a9619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admTanoy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-11 07:46:30</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_page_79373eafdbcfaf4005d2147a3a961940
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><css> .searchBg{
     background-color:#000;
}

.breadcrumbs-container a {
 color: #fff; 
}

.ta-item {
  color: #000 !important;
}


.breadcrumbs-container {
  background-color:#000 !important;
     border-bottom: 1px solid #75787B;
    border-top: 1px solid #75787B;
  color: #fff; 
  padding-top: 10px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
}
.subPageMainContainer{
width:100%;
clear:both; 
}

.btn-default {
    color: #fff;
